official_title: Encouraging individuals to seek training in the use of cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR) and automated external defibrillators (AEDs), and for other purposes.
subjects: Emergency medical services and trauma care

summary.text: Encourages: (1) individuals to seek training in the use of CPR (cardiopulmonary resuscitation) and AEDs (automated external defibrillators), and (2) bystanders to use hands-only CPR and AEDs to save the life of another person in cardiac arrest.

titles.title: Encouraging individuals to seek training in the use of cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR) and automated external defibrillators (AEDs), and for other purposes.
